Description: Implement complete user authentication including registration, login, password reset, email verification, and session management with JWT tokens.
Allow users to view and edit their profiles, upload avatars, manage skills, portfolios, and professional information.
Comprehensive account settings including notification preferences, privacy settings, language/locale, and account management.
Implement security measures including 2FA, session management, audit logging, and compliance with security best practices.
Enhance user interface with responsive design, dark mode, accessibility features, and improved user experience.
Comprehensive testing including unit tests, integration tests, E2E tests, and security testing for all profile features.
